all_reviews.review_title: One of the best product I've worked with!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BloxOne DDI?
its powerfulness, especially in terms of scripting, and the ratio stability/feature! also the robustness of its upgrades, and the confidence I've had in doing them!

What do you dislike about BloxOne DDI?
Some of the users have found the GUI to be complicated at first. Yet it's not something I've experienced personnally, except for finding some unusual features from time to time.

Recommendations to others considering BloxOne DDI:
check out the network insight boxes to ease the management of your switches! and don't forget reporting, which starts as a free appliance!

What problems is BloxOne DDI solving and how is that benefiting you?
Two major things : Adding a line of défense quick and efficient using DNS, and maintaining our ipam database. using API, we also trigger signals to add block lists to our firewalls. also, the possibility in automating the provisioning of IP addresses and DNS entries for some of our cloud infrastructures. last but not least, just everything that can be done using the product can be done using scripting! that adds even more possibilities to the product!
